body: I noticed that **HBgenration_**  node is not shown on the latest **HB Generate EP Output** component (see image 1 below), and the **HBGenerators_** node is also missing from the **HB Export to OpenStudio** component (see image 2 below). So, the questions are: 1. how to specify generator related output variables 2. where the **HBGeneratorSystem** node on the **HB Generationsystem** component (see image 3 below) shall connect to if we use the **HB Export to OpenStudio** component for simulation Thanks! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Gk5n2b-aPrHhdX*6dcvhmviGCmbcdYz3t4svKDdUrytRTWECd7xG8oDiCazj2VbS8An3en7O3kI95q8wNWE7TYF2Wh7T2-Dv/Image1.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Gk5n2b-aPrEJWDqYat3tRLAVBRroJaw-momB37lc-pdqAyAGWIJ8TXK0CJcxSruwbkCa0xGO4uk4B*KJUk2Eea97vkH6fpHp/Image2.png) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Gk5n2b-aPrEmF1qv0VHMbGLbeu40a1sWMwVNhWPZ25AFyXdLKUPmhrxJ-FVuyUvvMYCuEezJIHBYYL0YeIFaqpUJRLaL*jwF/Image3.png)
topic: [clarified, WIP] How to set HB generator related output variables and how to define generator system when using Export to OpenStudio component?
